name: Bounty Land
description:
Made for the GB Comp 2021.

This game is built around the "crash" sound in Gb Studio. I loved it so much I wanted to make a game around it.

This is a prototype and I plan to add more "Bounties".

The usual keys

Up, Down, Left, Right directional buttons on your keyboard.

"Z" and "X" stand in for the Game Boy  "A, B" buttons.

Enter for start

shift for select.

Made with  GB Studio 2 beta 5, GIMP and Libresprite.
